meanings.definition: Capable of being moved or stirred emotionally.
meanings.sent1: The touching movie left me feeling very motional.
meanings.sent2: She was motional after receiving the heartfelt letter from her friend.
meanings.sent3: The motional scene in the comedy made everyone laugh unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: His motional speech at the event brought tears to many eyes.
meanings.sent5: The motional music performance resonated deeply with the audience.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to motion or movement.
meanings.sent1: The motional car raced down the track at top speed.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's motional routine captivated the audience with its grace.
meanings.sent3: The motional roller coaster ride made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The motional waves crashed against the shore with great force.
meanings.sent5: The motional train journey through the mountains was breathtaking.
